oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-03-02 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 2, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Jimmy C. Newman; Grandpa Jones; Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (June Carter, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grandpa Jones, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ernest Tubb introduces Jimmy C. Newman -- The Way That You're Living (Is Breaking My Heart) (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Grandpa Jones -- Good Old Mountain Dew (Grandpa Jones) -- Ernest Tubb talks -- Don't Forbid Me (Ernest Tubb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Newman, Jimmy C.; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy
